short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for personalization shopify store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Facilitates editing Shopify content with CustomerVox
The CustomerVox Shopify personalization extension helps personalize your Shopify store and make the content unique based on customer data available. 

Create better site experiences with CustomerVox. Once the extension is downloaded, use our visual editor to personalize just about anything on your Shopify site – text, images, layouts and more – and then preview how these new experiences will look on various devices before launching your site personaliziation. Learn more about CustomerVox at customervox.com

By installing this item, you agree to use it in accordance with your applicable CustomerVox terms at https://www.customervox.com/terms and Privacy Policy at https://www.customervox.com/privacy
